summary: This document contains alerts regarding Richard Kahn, highlighting his involvement in regulatory actions and disciplinary measures by financial authorities. It details two significant events: a regulatory action by NYSE Arca in 2012 for failing to provide testimony and a fine imposed by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation in 2011.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is mentioned in connection with regulatory actions and disciplinary measures from financial authorities, including a permanent bar from NYSE Arca membership and a fine from the Florida Office of Financial Regulation.

persons.name: Richard Jeffrey Kahn
persons.context: Richard Jeffrey Kahn is noted for appearing on the Florida Office of Financial Regulation list of Final Orders, indicating a history of regulatory issues.

events.title: NYSE Arca Disciplinary Action
events.description: Richard Kahn was involved in a regulatory action where he and others were permanently barred from NYSE Arca membership for failing to provide requested testimony.

events.title: Florida Office of Financial Regulation Fine
events.description: Richard Jeffrey Kahn was fined $20,000 by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation as part of a consent agreement.

keyFacts: Richard Kahn was permanently barred from NYSE Arca membership due to failure to provide testimony.
Richard Jeffrey Kahn was fined $20,000 by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation.
Both Richard Kahn and Richard Jeffrey Kahn are noted for their regulatory issues in financial markets.
